title: Aatrox is coming back
body:
http://imgur.com/n2UA0ah

The recent buffs seem to be pushing Aatrox in a good direction, with a few tweaks to his build he's proven to be a tough opponent. Was able to 1v2 and 1v3 the enemy team at a certain stage and it looked as if I was carrying the game. If you're able to time your Hellbent well with your ultimate together then you can become pretty devastating in a team fight even if your by yourself. Haven't really tried a tank build yet on Aatrox so I'm not sure how effective it is vs full lifesteal but it looks promising with the missing health buff to his w.

replies.body:
Hellbent refreshing on minion death makes him pretty potent in the laning phase were he has always lacked.

Looking foward to logging some hours top/jungle on him and getting m5(a few 100 points off)

I think two lifesteal items , spirit visage then tank items seems the best way to go
